title: hello there!
text:
hello there!


Thanks for stopping by! I am a data visualization engineer who specializes in human-centered, accessible development in R Shiny and Quarto. Programming in R is my favorite thing (aside from my lovely children, husband, and hoofed friends). I also like chess, puzzles, and Avatar the Last Airbender.

                Leadership
            
        
        
            
        
    

  

  
   Current Position  
  I oversee ASTHO’s business intelligence planning and products (dashboards, data visualizations, data storytelling) and support the organization's use of data to inform
  decision making. One of my team’s flagship products is the Profile dashboard, which has received recognition for its modern design and useability. In addition to
  supporting ASTHO’s internal business intelligence needs, my team provides data services to partner organizations in dashboarding and data visualization. I am ASTHO's
  subject matter expert in R programming, interactive data visualization and data storytelling, and custom dashboard development. 
  

  
  Tailoring Shiny for Modern Users 
  ShinyConf 2024  
  My talk at ShinyConf was attended by ~400 participants and focused on UI and UX in shiny app development. My slides are available here. After the presentation, my work was featured on Eric Nantz's podcast, R Weekly Highlights. Check it out starting around 19:30.
